snippet: The bride is a territory manager for a medical devices company; the bridegroom, the son of a former chief executive of Time Warner Cable, founded a company that allows e-mails to be sent without leaving records. Both work in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: The bride is a territory manager for a medical devices company; the bridegroom, the son of a former chief executive of Time Warner Cable, founded a company that allows e-mails to be sent without leaving records. Both work in Chicago.

headline.seo: Katherine Kamp, Joseph Collins Jr. - Weddings
